A mery play betwene the pardoner and the frere, the curate and neybour Pratte Pardoner and the frere, the curate and the neybour Pratte Heywood, John, 1497?-1580?
[16] p.
Imprynted by Wyllyam Rastell, [[London] : the. v. day of Apryll, the yere of our lorde. M.CCCCC.xxxIII. [1533]]
By John Heywood. In verse. Caption title. Imprint from colophon. Signatures: A-B⁴. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
